text: Carla Angeline Reyes Abellana (born June 12, 1986) is a Filipino actress and model. Abellana was born in Manila, Philippines. She is the daughter of the former 80s heartthrob Rey 'PJ' Abellana and Rea Reyes. Her grandmother is Delia Razon. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Manila Category:Filipino Roman Catholics Category:Filipino movie actors Category:Filipino television actors
title: Carla Abellana
